title: 33: Rob Bell Becomes a Bible Broad
itunes:title: 33: Rob Bell Becomes a Bible Broad
description:
Rob Bell (New York Times Best Selling Author & one of Time Magazines “Most Influential People”) joins the podcast in a special #biblebroad episode. The Broads get vulnerable and ask some of their BIG questions about life, God, and the church. Rob discusses facing doubts, science in the church, incorrect interpretations of the Bible, leaving home, Jesus, Job, and much more!
Check out Rob Bell’s books and events coming to your city by going to robbell.com (http://robbell.com/) And hear more from him, check out his podcast: https://robbell.com/portfolio/robcast/
*** FAB FIT FUN: Go to fabfitfun.com (http://fabfitfun.com/) and use the code "CHATTY”  to save $10 off your first box!
*** ZEBIT: Go to Zebit.com/CHATTY and get $2500 dollars credit to the shop the Zebit marketplace at ZERO interest and ZERO cost to join!
*** ARTICLE: Go to ARTICLE.com/CHATTY TO GET $50 OFF YOUR FIRST PURCHASE OF $100 OR MORE!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
